# Node Version

> Node version.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var VERSION = require( '@stdlib/utils/node-version' );
```

#### VERSION

Node version.

``` javascript
console.log( VERSION );
// returns <string>
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

``` javascript
var semver = require( 'semver' );
var VERSION = require( '@stdlib/utils/node-version' );

if ( semver.lt( VERSION, '1.0.0' ) ) {
    console.log( 'Running on a pre-io.js version...' );
}
else if ( semver.lt( VERSION, '4.0.0' ) ) {
    console.log( 'Running on an io.js version...' );
}
else {
    console.log( 'Running on a post-io.js version...' );
}
```

<!-- </examples> -->


---

<section class="cli">

## CLI

<section class="usage">

### Usage

``` bash
Usage: node-version [options]

Options:

  -h,    --help                Print this message.
  -V,    --version             Print the package version.
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<section class="examples">

### Examples

``` bash
$ node-version
<node_version>
```

<!-- </examples> -->

<!-- </cli> -->
